name: scrappily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
UK in a way that is badly organized or put together: The film is too long, scrappily assembled, indulgent, and contradictory. He had played well for the first 12 holes but finished scrappily.
in a way that is untidy and not very attractive or well developed: The gym hall was decorated, but scrappily. This sparse, scrappily packaged DVD omits any substantial extras.
